name: Dungeon Racer - Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021
description:
By Chance Lytle

Inspired by super fast "menuing" found in speedruns

Created across 7 days of on/off work for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021

Wall and floor textures sourced from: http://pixeljoint.com/pixelart/68585.htm

WASD for menus, ENTER to select
